001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.View;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
013import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.databinding.FragmentLobbyBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel.GameViewModel;
016
017/**
018 * A {@link Fragment} subclass used to display the Lobby "screen" that is displayed when a user
019 * is about to join/create a new game of UNO.
020 */
021@AndroidEntryPoint
022public class LobbyFragment extends Fragment {
023
024  private FragmentLobbyBinding binding;
025  private GameViewModel gameViewModel;
026
027  @Nullable
028  @Override
029  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
030      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
031    binding = FragmentLobbyBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
032    binding.startGameBtn.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
033      gameViewModel.createGame();
034    });
035    binding.gameSettingsBtn.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
036      Intent intent = new Intent(getContext(), SettingsActivity.class);
037      startActivity(intent);
038    });
039    return binding.getRoot();
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
044    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
045    setupViewModel();
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public void onDestroy() {
050    binding = null;
051    super.onDestroy();
052  }
053
054  private void setupViewModel() {
055    ViewModelProvider provider = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity());
056    gameViewModel = provider.get(GameViewModel.class);
057    gameViewModel.getGame().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (game) -> {
058      if (game != null) {
059        Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot())
060            .navigate(LobbyFragmentDirections.navigateToGameFragment());
061      }
062    });
063  }
064
065}
